1: Live confidently, fully known and deeply understood.
2: Ever present understanding spans every action and thought.
3: Guiding presence surrounds every step and knows every way
4: Every word is fully known, its meaning completely understood.
5: Kind presence surrounds and guides on every side.
6: Celebrate wondrous wisdom that surpasses understanding and inspires continual growth.
7: A benevolent presence surrounds me wherever I go.
8: Divine presence fills every height and depth
9: I explore the farthest places and thrive
10: A guiding hand leads and supports everywhere.
11: Light surrounds me throughout the night.
12: Night shines like day; light and darkness are equally clear.
13: Life is formed and protected in the womb.
14: I celebrate my wonderful design and the marvels around me.
15: Cherish life as intricately formed and fully seen
16: Each life is lovingly known and shaped from the start.
17: Embrace countless precious thoughts that enrich life.
18: I wake still with you, amid countless loving thoughts.
19: I choose peaceful companions and practice justice.
20: People honor the divine and speak respectfully.
21: I stand with those who uphold goodness and truth.
22: I commit wholly to good and set firm boundaries.
23: I open my heart and thoughts to complete understanding.
24: I walk the everlasting path with steady guidance.
